Alisson Ayres

Software Engineer

Computer Science student at PUC-PR

Work experience

I'm currently a backend developer at a startup, primarily focused on building and maintaining integrations across various systems. My work involves using Python, Golang and Typescript across different projects.

My day-to-day responsibilities include developing new integrations from a Django project to various ERP Systems, and providing maintenance for existing integrations, microservices and messaging systems with technologies like Kafka and Redis. I also regularly work with technologies such as Grafana, Jenkins, Airflow, PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

Before transitioning into a software engineer role, I was part of the DevOps team. In that capacity, I gained experience with a range of technologies including GCP, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Linode, and Terraform.
